fcm_default_channel Push notifications Welcome to YFC.\nWhat is your name? And Surname? Nice to meet you,\n%s We need your email to welcome you to the YFC network By going through the registration process, you agree to our Terms & Conditions and verify you have read Privacy Policy. Let\'s confirm it\'s you Please share your phone number so we can send you a verification code Please enter the code we sent you We\'ve sent the code to %s Get another code Resend code: %ds Resend code to Whatsapp: %ds Send code via SMS A code was sent to the phone\n%s When is your\nbirthday? When were you born? What’s your\ngender? We have some female-only spots to suggest here Add your\nphoto Smile! This is for your access pass so they can recognise you at the gym/studio. Do you have a referral, influencer or corporate code? Enter code Enter it here Corporate code is invalid The code you entered is a referral code The code you entered is a challenge code The code you provided is for a female only challenge. Please make sure that you have selected the correct gender. You\'ve entered a valid corporate code You\'ve entered a valid influencer code As a %s affiliate you are eligible for an exclusive subscription rate of %s You\'ve entered a valid influencer code. You are now eligible for an exclusive subscription rate of %s Please check the code and retry or go back to registration process You can only use your referral code when you buy a YFC Gym subscription. Don\'t worry, buying a subscription and accessing all of our facilities is just a few taps away. You can only use your challenge code when joining a YFC challenge. Don\'t worry, joining this challenge is a couple of taps away. Great news! You\'ve successfully joined the %s challenge and can now monitor your progress on the %s leaderboard. No Contract\nCancel Anytime 20+ premium \nGym Locations Monthly Leaderboard\nChallenges Log In I don’t have an account Welcome back! We missed working out with you, let\'s get you settled in Progress Map Profile More Dashboard Calendar More awesomeness We love to surprise you - look out for these new things! Coming soon YFC Shop F.A.Q. All the hacks you should know Learn More Fitness Calendar My PT Calendar Manage your PT sessions Go to Calendar Go to Challenges Challenges Compete with other YFC users Go to Shop Get help Contact our support center Contact us F.A.Q. First time here? How to earn coins? How to earn credits? YFC partners How to join a challenge? Join the YFC Community How to buy a\ngym\nsubscription? How to buy a gym subscription? How to buy class credits? How to buy PT sessions? How to book PT sessions? How to manage PT sessions? How to spend your YFC coins? How to manage your fitness calendar? Stuck! Need Help? How to use your Class Access card? How to use your Gym Access card? Welcome to the YFC family Enjoy your fitness journey! Take a look Here\'s how Sync your fitness device and start uploading your activity data Burn calories, walk as many steps as possible and start earning points When you reach certain goals, you earn coins to spend in the YFC shop Every %s points will give you %s coins and when you reach %s points you get a massive %s coins! %d/%d The more classes you do, the more credits you get to spend on new bookings Each studio counts its own visits so you can only spend credits in the studio where you earned them %s credits %sth visit Use the Map to find gyms and personal trainers near you To work out at a gym in the YFC network, you need a subscription Earn coins for burning calories or walking steps using your fitness tracker – go, go, go! Your access card gets you into a gym Let\'s roll %s AED Go to gym list Go to studio list Meet our Gym partners! %s AED/month Let\'s find out Easily manage future class bookings Go to the My Fitness Calendar link on your dashboard to make any changes to your classes schedule Or you can access by tapping the more option Scheduled classes can be cancelled up to %d mins before the starting time\n\nDon\'t stress, if you cancel or reschedule a class, we\'ll credit you Any issues with our app or getting access to a YFC facility, please get in touch right away. One of our YFC Support staff will contact you within minutes Once you\'ve bought a YFC subscription, you immediately have access to all the gyms in our network. Enjoy your workout! Use our Map to find gyms where you live or work Use filters to get exactly what you want If you do not have a YFC subscription, tap \'Get Gym Access\' to open the subscription screen Choose a payment option and you\'re all set to join our family of fitness fans. Remember: you can cancel at any time! To Cancel, simply go to Profile > Subscription and tap on Cancel Auto Subscription Use your Quick Access Button to get access at any of the YFC Gyms. Proceed to Payment | AED %s Let us explain Once you’ve purchased YFC class credits you can book any class in our network On your profile screen tap class credits and purchase the package that meets your needs Use our Map to find studios and classes near you Pick a studio you like and you\'ll see a list of available classes Tap on the class you want to attend and book it If you don\'t have enough credits, top up with a package that suits your needs Choose a payment option and you\'re all set to join our family of fitness fans. Remember: you can cancel at any time! AED %s Class access cards are available %d minutes before the class starts. Tap on Quick Access to see info for the next available class. Confirm that this is the one you want, show them your access card and enjoy your workout! Tap on the Quick Access button to get in Verify location and check available access hours before proceeding with your session. This will help you have a smooth and hassle-free experience. Show them your Access Card If you\'re at a different location than you wanted, then select the correct one from your \'near to me\' list Still haven\'t found what you\'re looking for? Try the manual search! Want to earn YFC coins? 3 easy steps It\'s easy The more classes you do, the more credits you get to spend on new bookings Each studios counts its own visits so you can only spend credits in the studio where you earned them Once you have bought PT sessions, you can view their schedules and book sessions Use your Map to find the PT that meets your needs Use filters to refine your search Select the amount of sessions you need. And choose your payment option Use your PT calendar to book any available time slots Effortlessly handle your booking sessions with your dedicated personal trainer Find an available time slot Choose a preferred facility for your session from the available options Upon submitting your booking request, it will be sent to the PT. Once the PT confirms your booking, you will receive a notification, and your session will be successfully booked Easily manage your booked PT Sessions You can access your fitness calendar by tapping the link on your dashboard Or you can access by tapping the more option Go to the YFC Shop Take Note of your coin balance Each product has a maximum amount of coins you can use When adding a product to your cart. Use the slider to select the amount of YFC coins you want to use Join any of the public challenges and see where you rank on the leader board. Enter the unique code and join any of our private challenges. Become a part of the YFC community, where you can connect with friends, follow their fitness journeys, and provide mutual support to boost each other\'s workout efforts. Discover who has liked your workouts and participate in the challenges that your friends have already joined. To work out in all gyms, sign up now! Sign me up! Location Permission Needed OK This app needs the Location permission, please accept to use location functionality Yes No Need to enable gps GPS not available Head over to Settings, then give the app access to your geolocation, otherwise we can\’t show you gyms near you. Go to Phone Settings What is your location? Go to Phone Settings Are you here right now? Yes, I want to go in! No, I\'m not there, let\'s pick another? Find a YFC Facility Sorry it seems like you are a bit far away. Access Cards are only available if you are at a YFC Facility Need permission Go to permission settings “Your Fitness Coach” would like to access your location “Your Fitness Coach” would like to access your camera Remember, if you don\'t provide permission, we will not be able to find the gyms Remember, if you don\'t provide permission, you will not be able to use our AI-powered workouts Adjust filters No matches found Sorry, we don\'t have anything that matches that setting, can you adjust your filters? You have an upcoming class I\'m here, give me access! I\'ll go to the gym, thanks It\'s a bit quiet here… Your gym subscription isn\'t active right now and you don\'t have any classes booked Don\'t delay, kickstart your fitness journey now! Save progress Discard the changes and close No challenges found Government Dubai 30x30 Dubai 30x30 intercorporate Global Dubai 30x30 Check your progress in the Dubai 30x30 campaign You are all set! The challenge starts on 26 October 2024 Intercorporate competition Follow the progress of private and government companies During September, different companies will be battling it out against each other. Stay tuned and find out who comes out on top! Intercorporate leaderboard Dubai 30x30 is here! It is time for the Dubai Fitness Challenge 2024! 30 mins of activity for 30 consecutive days. Access your DFC features here. Dubai 30x30 is coming soon! Dubai 30x30 kicks off on October 26, offering a range of exciting opportunities. Engage in thrilling challenges, accumulate rewards, track your progress on leaderboards, and explore numerous other features. Place %s Dubai 30x30 Welcome to the Dubai 30x30 challenge where you are encouraged to work out for 30 mins per day for the next 30 days, starting 26 October 2024. 1. In this challenge, we\'ll be tracking the number of steps you take during your workouts. Ranking is based on your total amount of steps during Dubai 30x30.\n2. If you have a fitness wearable, it needs to be synchronized with either Apple Health or Google Fit.\n3. Your data will only be updated if you open the YFC app.\n4. You will need to open your app on or before the challenge ends on 24 November 2024. The leaderboard closes for submissions on 00:00 25 November 2024.\n5. Only recognized fitness wearables will be accepted. Any foreign device producing suspect data feedback will be removed from the challenge. App version: %s Build: %d The September step challenge is here! During the month of September, corporates will fight it out in an intercorporate step challenge. Stay updated on the excitement by keeping an eye on the intercorporate leaderboard.
